context_bundle.summary: Attack coordination and timing strategies for Robot Rumble. Focus fire, target prioritization, kill securing, coordinated strikes, and damage optimization across multiple robots per turn.

onboarding.quick_start: Focus fire: All robots attack same target until dead. Prioritize low HP enemies for quick kills. Attack > Move when enemy adjacent. Coordinate to kill before enemy turn.
common_patterns: Focus fire: All units target lowest HP enemy
Kill securing: Finish wounded enemies first
Overkill prevention: Don't waste attacks on dying units
Threat assessment: Target highest damage enemy
Positional attacks: Attack enemies blocking retreat

target_priority: 2. Enemy adjacent to multiple allies (focus fire)

code_snippets.adjacent_enemies: [e for e in enemies if dist(me, e) == 1]
